一公测就购买了，当年因为太害怕没怎么敢玩，现在心理承受能力强了回坑看看，爱上了护士姐姐，决心成为一名强悍温柔的护士长，苦练一周忽闻你制作者要削护士姐姐，这刀砍得还这么狠，测试服玩了玩，不能连续飞甚至不加基础移速，还要带配件才能暂时体验增加移速效果，好，够狠，配件效果一个比一个逗比，甚至算得上debuff，可以，我护士皮肤白买，您继续。

Наиграл 100+ часов и решил сделать обзор. Тут ужасный подбор игроков и рангов. Много читеров. В добавок тут ужаснейшее и токсичное комьюнити. Единственное что спасает это кастомные матчи с друзьями. Вот единственный плюс у игры. Всё остальное просто ужасно.

Это игра, где ты убегаешь от зомби, или ты сам есть зомби, где ты убиваешь самыми изощрёнными способами людей. То есть тут ты можешь придумать свою определённую местность, то есть можешь придумать ту же школу, так же в ней повесить, убить. Но тут более изощрённая ситуация. Тут ты не изготавливаешь крюк. Тебе даётся различное оружие, ты можешь мори делать.
Dobra giereczka

I'm going to recommend this game purely because it's fun. If it wasn't fun I would not play it. I have a very strong feeling that the developers are going to ruin the game then spit on it, and when that day comes I will stop playing and uninstall it.

BUGS: Too many. There are so many bugs that should have been fixed when the game was released, but alas the developers either don't know how or really don't care. They're too busy adding new content. I don't want new content, I want a game that works.

Bugs that I've seen in game:
-Getting kicked from party after almost every game because...reasons (no idea why.)
-Not being able to get out of Madness 3. (I literally wasn't given the prompt to "snap out of it."
-Getting hit through windows and pallets because of buggy and bad hitboxes. (I have plenty of saved clips showing how messed up they are.)
-Getting kicked from games when I didn't lose connection and my computer didn't die
-Getting kicked from games because Dead By Daylight crashed

EDIT: CURSED LEGACY BUGS
With the new update Cursed Legacy being added to the game, a plethora of new bugs have entered the game as well, basically making it unplayable, but I'm sure going to try and play it anyways.
-The wrong text is being displayed for the Doctor and his add-ons
-The game audio can be corrupted (whatever the hell that means)
-The game will literally not let you wiggle if a survivor is too close by, so you're screwed
-It's possible to FALL OUT OF THE WORLD and not be able to attempt to escape the hook, you can still struggle though in the second stage
-It's possible to get desynched between the host and client (very cool)
-The Oni can rotate much faster than intended in demon dash
-Nemesis doesn't trigger on obsession switch from furtive chase
-Oni receives blood orbs when hitting an injured survivor with endurance

SO BASICALLY, you're screwed if you play survivor for the time being until they manage to fix the garbage they added into their game.

This game is just poorly designed as a whole, if I'm being honest.

MAPS:
There were statistics released showing that killer wins 60-70% of the time on indoor maps. BHVR would rather add more content than balance the game, which says a lot.
-Indoor maps are basically a lost cause
-Outdoor maps are better and I hope they have a balanced win percentage on them, but I don't know because I haven't seen stats for that.

KILLER ADD-ONS: 
The low tier killer add-ons are fair, but for a few of the killers, their ultra rare add-ons are even rare add-ons are extremely busted.
-The Shape has fragrant tuft of hair which makes him permanently in tier 3 when he gets it and that allows him to down survivors in one hit. His other ultra rare allows him to Mori survivors when he hits tier 3, but makes him slightly slower. There's nothing you can do to counter that as survivor. 
-The Plague has an ultra rare that makes it so that she can see where you are for 6 seconds every time you vomit when you're sick. You vomit a lot when you're sick from the plague.
-Legion has add-ons that make it so they instantly break pallets whenever they vault them and a rare add-on that allows every survivor to hear the terror radius heartbeat when they're in feral frenzy. (Legion's is more annoying than anything.)
-The Trapper has add-ons that make it so whenever you disarm a bear trap you get injured. It's just annoying.

SURVIVING:
As a survivor in Dead By Daylight you can't really fight back against killers aside from with the power of pallet looping and a flashlight, if you have one. A flashlight will most likely get you tunneled by the killer because people with flashlights are obnoxious, but hey, what are you gonna do? 
Surviving takes a lot more skill than killing, because you really have nothing to work with compared to them. It's easiest to win with a group of people, but where are you gonna find people that actually want to play this game.
 As you progress through the game and start to get to the higher ranks, you'll begin to notice people will disconnect upon getting hit once, getting downed once, or they don't DC and just kill themselves on the hook. When that happens there is absolutely nothing you can do about it aside from lose because it's a 3v1. Reporting said players does nothing (as far as I know.) 
Sometimes the exit doors will spawn on the same wall together, but far apart so the killer can just walk back and forth and camp both doors, forcing you to lose. 
Survivor perks are good and all, but there's really no way to win a 1v1 unless you have a key, a door already open, or you found the hatch before the killer. 

CLOSING WORDS:
I like this game, it doesn't sound like it, but I do. I don't really like BHVR because they really don't put in effort into fixing this game, only adding in new content. I want a fixed game over content and I imagine a lot of people would agree with me on that.

If there was a middle ground I'd choose that because I don't recommend this game, but I don't not recommend this game, I'm in the middle. I think it's fun, but it is filled with issues that ren't  being fixed anytime soon.

At the time of this review, I have a little over 480 hrs. put into it. 

This game continues to surprise me. I love the variety of characters and customization that is available. It gives the game a personalized feel that keeps you looking for those new releases. While it can be frustratingly toxic at times, the community is nice, and they have a passion for the game that proves, to me at least, how much people like the game. It plays very well, with a few bugs here and there, and the developers are constantly improving every aspect of the game. 

The only issue I have with the game in general is the ranking system. Whether it matches you up with players that have a higher or lower rank than you, you will either die in the first ten seconds or live without seeing the killer once. The same goes for the killers. Very rarely have I ever gotten a match where I am the same (or close to) rank as the other players in the game. 

However, I don't think I will ever stop loving this game. It's fun to play alone and with friends. I would highly recommend it! See you all in the fog.

Эта игра кусок ебан ной помойки! сука просто бегаешь мансуешь от мана, просто делаешь все на карте, чинишь геники,спасаешь  тиму, ломаешь тотемы,а в итоге ебан ная игра не может обработать все данные и посчитать мой ранг(дать мне каплю) и дать очки крови, тем самым выводит  ебан ную ошибку, видите ли мы не может обработать ваш ранг пере зайдите в игру с ука горит!! ебан ная хуйня, а как в след катке тебя сливают первым так вот пожалуйста вам минус капля да-да идите на х уй ебан ный в рот вашего казино. Приеду на хуй к вам в компанию и насру под дверь,сука ебан ный пид арасы которые не могут уже 3 года сделать игру. Просто пиз дец! скиньте разрабам на сервера нормальные, а то как клепать ебан ные скиньчики с бесполезными перками так хоть каждый день, а как взять и доделать код с серверами так х уй!

Очень и очень неоднозначная игра. В ней есть и плюсы, и минусы расписывать которые я тут не буду т.к. до меня это уже было оглашено несколько десятков раз. DBD - одна из игр, которые не надоедают со временем. Да, рано или поздно Вы устанете в нее играть, но после небольшого перерыва она снова Вас позовет. Разработчики постоянно работают на игрой, так что постоянный новый контент Вам гарантирован. Самый существенный минус для новичка, как по мне, станет невероятно токсичное комьюнити. Благо в игре можно закрыть чат и не видеть пену у рта Ваших оппонентов/оппонента и даже союзников. Хотя во время матча токсичные действия увидеть придется. В этой игре давно стерты рамки приличия и уважения. Нет, разумеется, я встречал и адекватных людей. Очень приятно, когда за тебя заступаются твои же противники или противник потому что твои действия не были чем-то незаконным. Но увы, по большей части вас ждут помои на Вас, Вашу семью и Ваш род. И не только со стороны сурвов, но и убийц, тех, кого не принято в этом уличать. Скажу лишь, что в этой игре Вам нужно плюнуть на упреки и издевки в вашу сторону, иначе Вы потеряете много нервов на пустом месте.

Как уже писал ранее, в игре есть свои плюсы и минусы, но к покупке эту игру я Вам очень рекомендую. Единственное, можете ждать скидки, они довольно часто появляются. DBD не первая игра в подобном жанре, но на данный момент - это икона, которая затмевает все остальные проекты подобного жанра. И она не требует уделять ей много игрового времени, если Вы не готовы его ей посвящать и будете заходить поиграть под пивко. Если же Вы готовы сидеть в ней по несколько часов подряд, то вас ждет море и море прокачки. Так что в независимости от Вашего взгляда на игру, она ему будет соответствовать.

Если Вы думаете брать или нет, то, разумеется, да, да и еще раз да. Подобного опыта игры Вы больше нигде не получите.

Fun Game, killers are fun but there needs to be more game modes. Survivors need to have better perks and abilities and there are still lots of bad connection issues. Lobby times are long and the ranking system is pathetic. Other than that playing killer is more fun than survivor but there are certain perks that are just too good for certain killers and there needs to be more good perks. No one uses Dark Sense unless it's for the challenge. The maps are cool and the game modes now are fun. Devs are working on these issues but hopefully they will be fixed sooner than later. It's a fair game and it's really fun.

DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
This game is unplayable since about every 3 games the most horrific servers I've ever played on will kick you and make you lose your items and offerings. There is no way to reconnect. They where supposed to get dedicated servers but when they got  them they where worse than the old ones and went back to the old ones which still have a ton of issues. A bunch of the people I play with have this same issue so its not a matter of graphics card as some have 1080s with i7 or i9. SAVE YOUR MONEY. Amazing idea but it means absolutely nothing if you can't play the game. It is a horror game due the fact that you're scared of getting disconnected every game so if you like getting scared then yes this is the game for you.
